go now as we try to make our way around
Tripoli here today we visited a school
where one brave fourteen-year-old girl
went out of her way to tell us just what
it had been like she said it had been
terrifying that she had seen mercenaries
outside her door had been unable to
sleep because of all the gunfire in the
air and said that even some of her
teachers were not fully down with the
Qadhafi party line I am well aware that
the announcement of these hearings is
generated considerable controversy and
opposition this was a big day for
Congressman Peter King of New York he's
been planning these hearings on the
radicalization of American Muslims and
the homegrown terror threat for weeks
under intense criticism and throughout
the day he still
ground to back down would be a craven
surrender to political correctness and
an abdication of what I believe to be
the main responsibility of this
committee it was a packed room people
waited hours in line to get into the
small crowded committee hearing room
there were reporters camera people
people of all religious faiths law
enforcement officials civil rights
advocates all listening to some very
emotional testimony at one point
congressman keith Ellison one of two
Muslim members of Congress broke down in

home daddy was a fellow American who
gave his life for other Americans what
emerged was two competing portraits of
American Muslims one kind of an
uplifting vision of those who are
law-abiding citizens who serve their
country want to cooperate with law
enforcement officials and then a darker
portrait of Muslims who are not
confronting radicalization within their

cancer with it let me be clear and
stayed up front that unequivocally for
the record that the US has a significant

know listen I'm Muslim and I realize

that's what I'm trying to do this is

evidence clearly indicates a general
rise of violent extremism across

examining radicalization as an issue

about his efforts to engage the Muslim

Department is making a priority of

the results of muslim-americans

it's just good police say there is no

not only this area is trying to

muslims are the number one
